p: Histological examination was performed based on the methods by Huang et al. [ 16]. Briefly, after being dehydrated by ethanol, the tissue sections were paraffinized. After deparaffinization, some sections (thickness, 7 Âµm) were stained with hematoxylin and eosin (H&E); the others were processed for iNOS and COX-2 immunohistochemistry staining. BH2 Olympus microscopy was used to observe and photograph the samples. 3-5 tissue slices were randomly chosen from Control, Carr, Indo, and CS-LO-treated groups.
